languages.text: "Хочешь меняться? У меня есть товар". {n}Бродяга приподнимает лохмотья, и вы видите тускло блеснувшую рукоять пистолета.{/n} "А у тебя? Кишки — или что там норовит выпасть у тебя из брюха — не в счет".

"You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."
languages.original_text: "Хочешь меняться? У меня есть товар". {n}Бродяга приподнимает лохмотья, и вы видите тускло блеснувшую рукоять пистолета.{/n} "А у тебя? Кишки — или что там норовит выпасть у тебя из брюха — не в счет".

traits.locale_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The vagabond lifts his rags, and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What do you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: 「取引したいか？いいものがあるぜ」{n}乞食がボロ布を持ち上げると、ピストルの柄の鈍い光が見えた。{/n}「あんたは何を持ってる？内臓とか、腸に収まってるもんはなしだぜ」
languages.original_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."

traits.locale_text: 「取引したいか？いいものがあるぜ」{n}乞食がボロ布を持ち上げると、ピストルの柄の鈍い光が見えた。{/n}「あんたは何を持ってる？内臓とか、腸に収まってるもんはなしだぜ」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: “你想做笔交易吗？我这里确实有些东西。”{n}乞丐撩起了他的破烂衣衫，你看到了手枪枪柄黯淡的光芒。{/n}“你这里有什么？除了暂时还没从你肚子里掉出来的东西。”
languages.original_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."

traits.locale_text: “你想做笔交易吗？我这里确实有些东西。”{n}乞丐撩起了他的破烂衣衫，你看到了手枪枪柄黯淡的光芒。{/n}“你这里有什么？除了暂时还没从你肚子里掉出来的东西。”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: «¿Quiere comerciar? No tengo nada para intercambiar». {n}El mendigo levanta sus harapos y captas el brillo de la empuñadura de una pistola.{/n} «¿Qué tiene? Aparte de sus entrañas o lo que sea eso que sigue intentando caerse de sus tripas».
languages.original_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quiere comerciar? No tengo nada para intercambiar». {n}El mendigo levanta sus harapos y captas el brillo de la empuñadura de una pistola.{/n} «¿Qué tiene? Aparte de sus entrañas o lo que sea eso que sigue intentando caerse de sus tripas».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr handeln? Ich habe Sachen zum Handeln." {n}Der Bettler hebt seine Lumpen, und du siehst das dumpfe Glitzern eines Pistolengriffs.{/n} "Was habt Ihr? Abgesehen von Euren Innereien oder was auch immer das ist, was da ständig versucht, aus Eurem Bauch zu fallen."
languages.original_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr handeln? Ich habe Sachen zum Handeln." {n}Der Bettler hebt seine Lumpen, und du siehst das dumpfe Glitzern eines Pistolengriffs.{/n} "Was habt Ihr? Abgesehen von Euren Innereien oder was auch immer das ist, was da ständig versucht, aus Eurem Bauch zu fallen."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: « Ah, vous voulez faire affaire ? J'ai deux-trois trucs en réserve. » {n}Le mendiant soulève ses guenilles l'espace d'un instant, et vous apercevez brièvement la crosse d'un pistolet.{/n} « Alors, qu'est-ce que vous avez de beau ? En dehors de vos entrailles, ou quel que soit ce truc qu'essaie de vous sortir du ventre. »
languages.original_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, vous voulez faire affaire ? J'ai deux-trois trucs en réserve. » {n}Le mendiant soulève ses guenilles l'espace d'un instant, et vous apercevez brièvement la crosse d'un pistolet.{/n} « Alors, qu'est-ce que vous avez de beau ? En dehors de vos entrailles, ou quel que soit ce truc qu'essaie de vous sortir du ventre. »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: "Takas yapmak ister misin? Takas edecek eşyalarım var." {n}Dilencinin paçavralarını kaldırmasıyla bir tabancanın kabzası görünüp kayboluyor.{/n} "Sende ne var? İçinden çıkmaya çalışan bağırsakların hariç tabii."
languages.original_text: "You wanna trade? I've got things to trade." {n}The beggar lifts his rags and you catch the dull glint of a pistol handle.{/n} "What've you got? Apart from your innards or whatever that thing is that keeps trying to fall outta your gut."

traits.locale_text: "Takas yapmak ister misin? Takas edecek eşyalarım var." {n}Dilenci, paçavralarını kaldırıyor ve bir tabancanın kabzası görünüp kayboluyor.{/n} "Sende ne var? İçinden çıkmaya çalışan o bağırsak gibi şey hariç tabii."
traits.speaker: TrampMain
